OOC: Oh sure, just make it easy for me why don't you.....

Diamond:
She had collected reptile DNA from snakes&lizards. Bird DNA from 
raptors, scavangers, water fowl and other types of birds.  Mammals 
from large cats, to small canine to rodents to flying mammals and 
tree climbing primates.  She tried to get as much DNA as she could. 
She dropped off the samples at the lab and returned to her 
room. "Hsssss, I want to shed mech fluid, not be an errand bot for 
lab rats."

> I'm playing it by ear Logo, thats what roleplaying does, name the 
samples
> and I'll go from there.
